title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 53 - REQUIREMENTS GOVERNING IMPORTATION OF CATTLE
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 53 - REQUIREMENTS GOVERNING IMPORTATION OF CATTLE
State Regulations
§ 53.1 - Definitions
§ 53.2 - General requirements
§ 53.3 - Importation of cattle to a specifically approved stockyard or a recognized slaughtering establishment
§ 53.4 - Importation of cattle to be fed for slaughter
§ 53.5 - Importation of cattle for any purpose other than immediate slaughter or feeding for slaughter
§ 53.6 to 53.9 - Repealed
§ 53.10 - Repealed
§ 53.11 - Repealed
§ 53.12 - Repealed
§ 53.13 - Repealed
§ 53.14 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 53

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§18, 72, 74, 76

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
